title: When will the classes commence for BTech 1st year?
content: Called the university (they're saying first week of august, but I don't think so, bcz KCET seat allotment for round 1 is from Aug 8), can anyone clarify?

comments.body: there isn't an official date i think. I went to the college and they told me it'll probably start after 12th but there's no info sadly
Bro kts sept 1st coz kcet 3 rounds shld commence so ye
PES only waits for the first round of KCET.
I called them today, they're saying it'll most probably  start in 2nd week of august
What about the people who got PES seat in 2nd/2nd extended round thru kcet?
No orientation direct classes for them
bro , i think it will start on aug last week....see rh chemistry video on yt
